buildQuestion

public static boolean buildQuestion(java.lang.String packageName,
                                    java.lang.String omURL)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Builds a question into a target jar file on OM developer web application.

Be careful that question must have been previously created at that 'questions' folder with createQuestion method.

Parameters:
packageName - Package's name
omURL - OM developer web application URL
Returns:
true if build succeeded, false if it failed
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

publishQuestion

public static void publishQuestion(QuestionRelease questionRelease,
                                   java.lang.String omURL,
                                   java.lang.String omTnProURL,
                                   boolean deployJar)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Publish a question on OM Test Navigator web application production environment.

Parameters:
questionRelease - Question release
omURL - OM developer web application URL
omTnProURL - OM test navigator web application URL (production environment)
deployJar - Flag to indicate that we need to copy question's far file from OM Developer web application to OM Test Navigator web application (production environment)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

deployQuestion

public static void deployQuestion(Question question,
                                  java.lang.String omURL,
                                  java.lang.String omTnURL,
                                  boolean deployJar,
                                  boolean overwrite)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Deploys a question on OM Test Navigator web application test environment.

Parameters:
question - Question
omURL - OM developer web application URL
omTnURL - OM test navigator web application URL (test environment)
deployJar - Flag to indicate that we need to copy question's far file from OM Developer web application to OM Test Navigator web application (test environment)
overwrite - Flag to indicate that referenced OM test navigator deploy xml file and question's jar file will be overwritten if they exist (true) or not (false)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

initialDeployChecks

private static void initialDeployChecks(Question question,
                                        java.lang.String omURL,
                                        java.lang.String omTnURL,
                                        boolean deployJar,
                                        boolean overwrite,
                                        boolean publish)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Perform several initial checks before start generating any files to deploy a question on OM Test Navigator.

Parameters:
question - Question
omURL - OM developer web application URL
omTnURL - OM test navigator web application URL (test or production environment)
deployJar - Flag to indicate that we need to copy question's far file from OM Developer web application to OM Test Navigator web application
overwrite - Flag to indicate that referenced OM Test Navigator deploy xml file and question's jar file will be overwritten if they exist (true) or not (false)
publish - true if we are publishing the xml to a Test Navigator production environment, false if we are deploying the jar to a Test Navigator test environment
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getAnswerComparatorByPosition

private static java.util.Comparator<Answer> getAnswerComparatorByPosition()
Get a comparator that can be used to sort a list of answers by position.

Note that can't be used with lists with null answers.

Returns:
Comparator that can be used to order a list of answers by position

stopAllSessionsForQuestion

public static void stopAllSessionsForQuestion(java.lang.String packageName,
                                              java.lang.String omTnURL)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
Stop all active Test Navigator sessions that are using a question.

It is needed to be sure that the jar file for that question at questioncache folder of OM Question Engine web application is unlocked so it can be deleted.

Parameters:
packageName - Package's name
omTnURL - OM test navigator web application URL
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
